kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.doc: Executes the sqlString as SQL commands. Useful to pass arguments to your sql. Set optional input `sansTran` to
kw.msg: Executing : Execute SQL String | delete from ajb_account_transaction where id=888888

kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to
kw.msg: Executing : Connect To Database Using Custom Params : pymysql.connect(db_api_2.connect(host='192.168.1.32',port=3306,user='root',passwd='aijia1234567',db='account'))
